Title: Stronger
Writer: John Pollono (screenplay by), Jeff Bauman (based on the book "Stronger" by), Bret Witter (based on the book "Stronger" by)
Actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Tatiana Maslany, Miranda Richardson, Richard Lane Jr.
Plot: Stronger is the inspiring real life story of Jeff Bauman, an ordinary man who captured the hearts of his city and the world to become a symbol of hope after surviving the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing.
